I thank @EdLaborCmte for their work in passing the bipartisan Pregnant Workers Fairness Act. I introduced the PWFA so no one would have to decide between a paycheck and the health of their pregnancy.

It’s simple: Pregnant workers shouldn't be forced to make impossible choices. https://twitter.com/EdLaborCmte/status/1217139343929872387 …

To learn more about why I introduced the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act and how it will help countless women work safely throughout their pregnancy, check out this piece from @CBSSunday: https://www.cbsnews.com/news/fighting-for-overdue-protections-for-pregnant-workers-pregnant-workers-fairness-act/?ftag=CNM-00-10aab8c&linkId=80504021 …

This morning @EdLaborCmte will mark up my bill—the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act—which provides pregnant workers the basic accommodations they need to stay on the job. No one should have to choose between a healthy pregnancy and a job.
